name: SuperComputer
description:
This game can be played with 2 - 4 people. The goal of SuperComputer is to build the best PC. Out-bid your opponents for new hardware to increase your computer’s RAM and DISK space, and Connect them in patterns to get an RYGB Bonus to get the most Victory Points.

Tabletopia: https://tabletopia.com/playground/supercomputer-3dfkwh/play-now
